name: The Ultimate Snack Attack (CarwashStraat)
description:
A game that is made during the BIG Game Jam event in Brussels in april 2015. Some changes were made, mostly in sound fx and music. It's also possible to play the game with a keyboard now.

JCVD

arrows for direction

?: punch

.: Kick

Fritkot

d: right

q: left

z: up

s:down

f:punch

g:kick
